title: The Complete Bloodhound
description: "The Complete Bloodhound", the first major text on the breed in many years, is a monumental and overall view of one of the world's oldest and most intriguing purebreds. From the monastery kennels of medieval Europe to the homes , show rings and law enforcement agencies of the present day, the Bloodhound's amazing story unfolds. Here are the vivid exploits and exciting pictures of the great man trailers and the memorable show dogs. From their true accounts you will quickly understand what makes the Bloodhound special to his admiring fans. In every way "The Complete Bloodhound" is a modern masterpiece and an outstanding contribution to the literature of one of the world's most distinguished dog breeds.
author: Catherine F. Brey and Lena F. Reed
